hero.title: We create
hero.description: At INDIGO PRODUXION we transform ideas into audiovisual masterpieces. From music and video recording to mastering and post-production, we create unique content that connects with the soul.

recording.description: Acoustically treated studio with high-end equipment to capture the best sound

mixing.description: Professional processing that brings life and clarity to your recordings

meta.homeTitle: INDIGO PRODUXION - Professional Music Production Studio | Recording, Mixing & Mastering
meta.homeDescription: Professional music production studio in Mexico City. Recording, mixing, mastering and audiovisual production services with high-end equipment and experienced producers.
meta.servicesDescription: Complete music production services: professional recording, mixing, mastering, music video production and audio post-production in Mexico City.
meta.portfolioDescription: Discover our best music production work, music videos and audiovisual projects. Over 500 tracks produced with national and international artists.
